items.summary: Replace the current logo in the Hero component with the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo image (Brilliant Coaching Centre copy (1).jpg) showing a lightbulb design with yellow student figure and the text 'brilliant COACHING CENTRE' in gold/yellow on dark background with maroon border
Store the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo as a static asset in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory and update the Hero component to reference this asset path
